title: NumPy: Array Sum Calculation
story: Data scientists use NumPy for efficient numerical computations. Let's verify that NumPy works in our environment by calculating the sum of an array.
instructions: Use NumPy to create an array [10, 20, 30, 40, 50] and print its sum. Import numpy as np and use np.array() and .sum() methods.
starterCode:
import numpy as np

# Create array and print sum
data = np.array([10, 20, 30, 40, 50])
result = data.sum()
print(result)
solutionHidden:
import numpy as np

data = np.array([10, 20, 30, 40, 50])
result = data.sum()
print(result)

tests.expectedBehavior: Print the sum of array elements

hints.text: Use np.array() to create the array from a Python list.
Call the .sum() method on the NumPy array to get the total.
